name: Noah Inc.
description:
WARNING: THIS IS A PROTOTYPE! 

This means that im trying to figure out if the mechanics are fun or not. If they are, I might keep building more content. If you found it fun (or not!) please help me by leaving a comment and telling me what did you enjoy or not. It would be super appreciated :)

HOW TO PLAY
  • Make money by choosing Creature contracts. 
    • Careful! Creatures have a maintenence cost.
  • Load your creatures in a ship to send them away
    • Select a module for the requiered Creature tmosphere so it can go on the ship
    • Send the creatures to a new planet. The better suited, the more reputation you get.
      • Planets farther away from your base are not explored!
  • With more reputation you can getter better ships, modules and even contracts.
  • Expand your ship range by building Outposts.
    • Careful! You will lose your ships when you do that!
INCOMING CHANGES (THINGS MISSING)
  • Save system.
  • A nice menu
  • A quest system
